column3: Why debug? Message is better with the explicit "memory pool".\n
Tend to NACK for the `showDebug` wall, though ACK the text change. Explicitly mention "memory pool" might be good and could solve cure some wild thought.\n
Yes, new text is better, don't know about `showDebug`. It's a miner policy option, not so much a debugging one.\n
Addressed nits. (Let's leave the `showDebug` for later to clean up, if wanted)\n
